    junit.framework.Test
    public class TestTableTag
extends AbstractTagTest

    • Method Detail

      • setUpJelly

        protected void setUpJelly()
        Sets up the Jelly context. Creates the model for the table and stores it as a variable in the context. Also, a special bean context is put into the builder data object.
        Overrides:
        setUpJelly in class AbstractTagTest

      • createParentBeanStore

        protected BeanStore createParentBeanStore()
        Creates the parent bean store for the bean context used during script execution. By overriding this method derived classes can inject their own beans into the context used by the script. This implementation adds the central application bean to the parent bean store.
        Overrides:
        createParentBeanStore in class AbstractTagTest
        Returns:
        the parent bean store
